snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo’s top donors were mostly real estate developers, including Leonard Litwin, who gave $250,000 through a host of companies that he controls.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo’s campaign reports nearly $22.5 million in the bank,  formidable war chest that could scare off potential rivals when he seeks re-election in 2014; his top donors are mostly real estate developers, including Leonard Litwin, who gave $250,000 through host of companies that he controls.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo’s top donors were mostly real estate developers, including Leonard Litwin, who gave $250,000 through a host of companies that he controls.

headline.seo: Cuomo Raises Nearly $22.5 Million for Re-election Campaign
headline.main: Cuomo Raises $22.5 Million for Re-election Bid
headline.print_headline:
For 2014 Bid,
Cuomo Has
$22.5 Million
In War Chest
